text: (Munibuke) ubwo Musa yasabiraga abantu be amazi (ubwo bari bishwe n’inyota) nuko tukamubwira tuti “Kubita inkoni yawe ku ibuye.” (Arikubise) riturikamo amasoko cumi n’abiri, nuko buri muryango umenya isoko unyweraho.
